Field Detail

_currentDateTime

private org.joda.time.MutableDateTime _currentDateTime
The Current date time of the clock.

_fieldType

private org.joda.time.DurationFieldType _fieldType
The DurationFieldType. The clock will advance according to this type. exp. If the field type is set to DurationFieldType.minutes() each second will correspond to a minute. By default it is set to DurationFieldType.minutes().

_mustStop

private volatile boolean _mustStop
Indicates if the clock must stop.

_clockThread

private java.lang.Thread _clockThread
This thread advances the clock according to the _fieldType.

_lockObject

private java.lang.Object _lockObject
Object used for locking.

_listeners

private java.util.List<IClockListener> _listeners
All the IClockListeners.

_speed

private int _speed
The speed of the clock. Basically how milliseconds it will wait before it ticks again. By default it is set to 1000.

INSTANCE

private static Clock INSTANCE
The singleton instance for this class.

THREAD_NAME

private static final java.lang.String THREAD_NAME
The name of the _clockThread.
